rastreio

Class Rastreio

  • java.lang.Object
    • rastreio.Rastreio

  • public class Rastreio
extends java.lang.Object
    Get tracking object data by scrapping Correios' HTML server response.

    Example of tracking an object in another thread:

       Rastreio.track("JT124720455BR", new Rastreio.Listener() {
     public void onSuccess(TrackObject trackObject) {
       // Use this tracking object
     }
   
     public void onFailure(Exception e) {
       // Report exception
       e.printStackTrace();
     }
   });

    See track(String, Listener) for more information.

    Also it is possible to wait until operation is completed in the same thread:

       try {
     TrackObject trackObject = Rastreio.trackSync("JT124720455BR");
     // Use this tracking object
   } catch (IOException e) {
     // Report exception
     e.printStackTrace();
   }

    See trackSync(String) for more information.

    See Also:
    Rastreio.Listener, TrackObject

      static interface  Rastreio.Listener

    • Method Detail

      • track

        public static void track(java.lang.String objectCode,
                         Rastreio.Listener listener)
        Track an object by its code asynchronously.

        When track operation finishes listener is called with result.

        Parameters:
        objectCode - string representing object track code
        listener - listener to be called when object tracking is completed
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if objectCode or listener is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if objectCode is empty or invalid
        See Also:
        Rastreio.Listener

      • trackSync

        public static TrackObject trackSync(java.lang.String objectCode)
                             throws java.io.IOException
        Track an object by its code synchronously.
        Parameters:
        objectCode - string representing object track code
        Returns:
        new tracking object to query tracking data
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an network error occur
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if objectCode is null
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if objectCode is empty or invalid
        See Also:
        TrackObject

      • setImplementation

        public static void setImplementation(Implementation implementation)
        Change underlying implementation.
        Parameters:
        implementation - rastreio implementation to be used
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if implementation is null
        See Also:
        Implementation, DefaultImplementation, EnhancedImplementation
